channel.title: Ai on Tech ramblings by Marcin
channel.description: Recent content in Ai on Tech ramblings by Marcin

item.title: Watercolor portrait - made by AI
item.description: An illustration This article is inspired by a post I’ve stumbled upon on LinkedIn, by Guido Appenzeller Below you can find a reinterpretation of his post. With added details here, and there. The reason for that, is twofold - a) I really like the workflow, b) the original post is missing some details for a first-time user of those tools. Flux is incredibly good to generate profile pictures, for example this Watercolor one.
